content: karl johan mushroom ornament co 6 sts knit all kfb k1 kfb k1 kfb k1 9 knit all kfb all 18 knit 4 rounds 18 k2tog k7 k2tog k7 16 knit all k2tog k6 k2tog k6 14 knit 2 rounds k2tog k1 until the last 2 k2tog 9 gently fill the bottom of the stem with poly fill so the bulb bit has weight to it and keeps its shape knit 3 rounds kfb all 18 kfb k2 24 kfb k3 30 change to brown yarn tie off the white tail and brown tail after knitting the first round of brown tuck into the stem knit all 30 purl all 30 k2tog k13 28 knit all k2tog k5 24 knit all k2tog k2 18 knit all k2tog 9 knit all k1 k2tog 6 stuff the top gently with poly fill thread the tail through the last 6 stitches and create a loop and tie off to hang finally thread through the mushroom to hide the remaining tail
